solution_line_template: {water_fraction}th of {total_water_liters} liters of water is {total_water_liters}*({water_fraction}) = <<{total_water_liters}*({water_fraction})={water_amount}>>{water_amount} liters

{vinegar_fraction}th of {total_vinegar_liters} liters of vinegar is {total_vinegar_liters}*({vinegar_fraction}) = <<{total_vinegar_liters}*({vinegar_fraction})={vinegar_amount}>>{vinegar_amount} liters
{water_amount} liters of water mixed with {vinegar_amount} liters of vinegar gives {water_amount}+{vinegar_amount} = <<{water_amount}+{vinegar_amount}={total_mixture}>>{total_mixture}-liter mixture
